---
title: "lifegamer"
format: gfm
---

Lifegame implementation in R without `if`-expressions and `for`-loops.


```{r setup}
#| include: false
devtools::load_all()
```

## Examples

### 10-pixels segment

```{r segment10}
animate(lifegame(first_generation_segment10(), 25), ncol = 5)
```

### Octagon

```{r octagon}
animate(lifegame(first_generation_octagon(), 10), ncol = 5)
```
